# cleura Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "cleura" {
  host     = "https://rest.cleura.cloud"
  username = "username"
  token    = "yourtokenstring"
}
```

## Schema

### Optional

- `host` (String)
- `token` (String, Sensitive)
- `username` (String)
